creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: black, maroon and white band of tassels with supplementary weft of yellow and white designs; maroon and white open braid with hanging tassels wrapped in red, green and black with metal beads, pink seed beads and metal wrapped cord; end cords (two-ply, twisted) are same color fringe in each bundle but all bundles are not same color; random placement of yellow, maroon, green, blue and red; all end in pink bead
medium: Silk or rayon (?), white metal, glass
title: Tassel band
